message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $130?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $140. This is my best price, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $135 as my maximum offer for the product. I hope this aligns with your needs.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence! I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm happy to work with you. However, I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to compromise again. I can offer it to you for $142. This is my final concession, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hello Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. I would like to propose $140 as my maximum offer for the product. I hope this helps us to close the deal.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your flexibility and willingness to meet me at $140. However, I still need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $141, but that's as low as I can go. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand your need to make a profit. I would like to propose $140 as my final offer for the product. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I've already compromised significantly. I'm willing to sell the product to you at the price you initially offered in round 6, which was $140. I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
